body:
{
  "title": "TEST!!! (PKA Create Your Own Cartoon Character That Moves!)",
  "step1": "In this Create Project, you’ll explore cartooning and animation basics by designing a fun character and showing how it moves using simple animation techniques.\n\nYour challenge:\n  • Create a cartoon character with a big personality!\n • Then, draw that character doing something—like waving, jumping, dancing, or showing emotion.\n • Make it look like it’s moving by showing it in more than one pose or frame.",
  "step2": "Time to dream up your animated world!",
  "step3": "Now, bring it to life!",
  "step4": "Take a minute to review how your Project went.",
  "description": "Can your drawing come to life? Learn the secrets of cartooning and animation, then create a character that looks like it’s ready to jump off the page!",
  "levels": [3,4,5,6,7,8],
  "focus": "Visual",
  "topic": "Drawing",
  "format": "Project",
  "learning_mode": "Create",
  "subject": "Arts"
}
